name: Mobius Money
intro: An Automated Market Maker (AMM) on Celo
introduce: Mobius is an Automated Market Maker (AMM) on Celo based on the StableSwap invariant that specializes in low-slippage swaps between price-stable tokens. Mobius also includes a bridge interface to allow users to easily migrate their assets, thereby paving the way for more capital to be bridged to Celo and efficiently swapped for other assets with the same underlying.
